#labels Featured,Selection,GWT
=Purpose=

The purpose of the rocket.selection package is to expose in a browser independent manner the ability to work with selections. Currently there are two main very different mechanisms to
work with selections, the Internet Explorer way and the standards way.



=Features=

Using `rocket.selection.client.SelectionHelper` and accompanying classes it is possible to perform the following actions.



  * Test if a selection exists
  * Delete from the DOM a selection
  * Read the start and end points of a selection.
  * Programmatically set the start and end points of a selection
  * Surround  a selection with an element.
  * Extract the DOM nodes within a selection and make them a child of another element.


=Further samples=

For further examples refer to the unit tests `rocket.selection.test.selection.client.SelectionTest`
